systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

alertRuleTemplateName.Description: The Name of the alert rule template used to create this rule.

description.Description: The description of the alert rule.

displayName.Description: The display name for alerts created by this alert rule.

enabled.Description: Determines whether this alert rule is enabled or disabled.

lastModifiedUtc.Description: The last time that this alert has been modified.

severity.Description: The severity for alerts created by this alert rule.

tactics.Description: The tactics of the alert rule

techniques.Description: The techniques of the alert rule

alertRuleTemplateName.Description: The Name of the alert rule template used to create this rule.

description.Description: The description of the alert rule.

displayName.Description: The display name for alerts created by this alert rule.

enabled.Description: Determines whether this alert rule is enabled or disabled.

lastModifiedUtc.Description: The last time that this alert has been modified.

displayNamesFilter.Description: the alerts' displayNames on which the cases will be generated

displayNamesExcludeFilter.Description: the alerts' displayNames on which the cases will not be generated

productFilter.Description: The alerts' productName on which the cases will be generated

severitiesFilter.Description: the alerts' severities on which the cases will be generated

alertRuleTemplateName.Description: The Name of the alert rule template used to create this rule.

templateVersion.Description: The version of the alert rule template used to create this rule - in format <a.b.c>, where all are numbers, for example 0 <1.0.2>

description.Description: The description of the alert rule.

displayName.Description: The display name for alerts created by this alert rule.

enabled.Description: Determines whether this alert rule is enabled or disabled.

lastModifiedUtc.Description: The last time that this alert rule has been modified.

suppressionDuration.Description: The suppression (in ISO 8601 duration format) to wait since last time this alert rule been triggered.

suppressionEnabled.Description: Determines whether the suppression for this alert rule is enabled or disabled.

tactics.Description: The tactics of the alert rule

techniques.Description: The techniques of the alert rule

incidentConfiguration.Description: The settings of the incidents that created from alerts triggered by this analytics rule

query.Description: The query that creates alerts for this rule.

queryFrequency.Description: The frequency (in ISO 8601 duration format) for this alert rule to run.

queryPeriod.Description: The period (in ISO 8601 duration format) that this alert rule looks at.

severity.Description: The severity for alerts created by this alert rule.

triggerOperator.Description: The operation against the threshold that triggers alert rule.

triggerThreshold.Description: The threshold triggers this alert rule.

customDetails.Description: Dictionary of string key-value pairs of columns to be attached to the alert

entityMappings.Description: Array of the entity mappings of the alert rule

createIncident.Description: Create incidents from alerts triggered by this analytics rule

groupingConfiguration.Description: Set how the alerts that are triggered by this analytics rule, are grouped into incidents

lookbackDuration.Description: Limit the group to alerts created within the lookback duration (in ISO 8601 duration format)

matchingMethod.Description: Grouping matching method. When method is Selected at least one of groupByEntities, groupByAlertDetails, groupByCustomDetails must be provided and not empty.

groupByEntities.Description: A list of entity types to group by (when matchingMethod is Selected). Only entities defined in the current alert rule may be used.

groupByAlertDetails.Description: A list of alert details to group by (when matchingMethod is Selected)

groupByCustomDetails.Description: A list of custom details keys to group by (when matchingMethod is Selected). Only keys defined in the current alert rule may be used.

entityType.Description: The V3 type of the mapped entity

fieldMappings.Description: array of field mappings for the given entity mapping

identifier.Description: the V3 identifier of the entity

columnName.Description: the column name to be mapped to the identifier

alertDisplayNameFormat.Description: the format containing columns name(s) to override the alert name

alertDescriptionFormat.Description: the format containing columns name(s) to override the alert description

alertTacticsColumnName.Description: the column name to take the alert tactics from

alertSeverityColumnName.Description: the column name to take the alert severity from

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

triggerUri.Description: Logic App Callback URL for this specific workflow.

workflowId.Description: The name of the logic app's workflow.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

displayName.Description: The display name of the automation rule.

order.Description: The order of execution of the automation rule.

actions.Description: The actions to execute when the automation rule is triggered.

lastModifiedTimeUtc.Description: The last time the automation rule was updated.

createdTimeUtc.Description: The time the automation rule was created.

lastModifiedBy.Description: Information on the client (user or application) that made some action

createdBy.Description: Information on the client (user or application) that made some action

isEnabled.Description: Determines whether the automation rule is enabled or disabled.

expirationTimeUtc.Description: Determines when the automation rule should automatically expire and be disabled.

conditions.Description: The conditions to evaluate to determine if the automation rule should be triggered on a given object.

propertyName.Description: The property to evaluate in an automation rule property condition.

actionType.Description: The type of the automation rule action.

classification.Description: The reason the incident was closed

classificationReason.Description: The classification reason the incident was closed with

classificationComment.Description: Describes the reason the incident was closed.

owner.Description: Information on the user an incident is assigned to

labels.Description: List of labels to add to the incident.

email.Description: The email of the user the incident is assigned to.

assignedTo.Description: The name of the user the incident is assigned to.

objectId.Description: The object id of the user the incident is assigned to.

userPrincipalName.Description: The user principal name of the user the incident is assigned to.

ownerType.Description: The type of the owner the incident is assigned to.

actionType.Description: The type of the automation rule action.

logicAppResourceId.Description: The resource id of the playbook resource.

tenantId.Description: The tenant id of the playbook resource.

objectId.Description: The object id of the client.

userPrincipalName.Description: The user principal name of the client.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

created.Description: The time the bookmark was created

createdBy.Description: Describes a user that created the bookmark

displayName.Description: The display name of the bookmark

labels.Description: List of labels relevant to this bookmark

queryResult.Description: The query result of the bookmark.

updated.Description: The last time the bookmark was updated

updatedBy.Description: Describes a user that updated the bookmark

queryStartTime.Description: The start time for the query

queryEndTime.Description: The end time for the query

incidentInfo.Description: Describes an incident that relates to bookmark

objectId.Description: The object id of the user.

awsRoleArn.Description: The Aws Role Arn (with CloudTrailReadOnly policy) that is used to access the Aws account.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

classification.Description: The reason the incident was closed

classificationComment.Description: Describes the reason the incident was closed

classificationReason.Description: The classification reason the incident was closed with

createdTimeUtc.Description: The time the incident was created

firstActivityTimeUtc.Description: The time of the first activity in the incident

incidentUrl.Description: The deep-link url to the incident in Azure portal

labels.Description: List of labels relevant to this incident

lastActivityTimeUtc.Description: The time of the last activity in the incident

lastModifiedTimeUtc.Description: The last time the incident was updated

owner.Description: Describes a user that the incident is assigned to

relatedAnalyticRuleIds.Description: List of resource ids of Analytic rules related to the incident

alertsCount.Description: The number of alerts in the incident

bookmarksCount.Description: The number of bookmarks in the incident

commentsCount.Description: The number of comments in the incident

alertProductNames.Description: List of product names of alerts in the incident

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

createdTimeUtc.Description: The time the comment was created

lastModifiedTimeUtc.Description: The time the comment was updated

author.Description: Describes the client that created the comment

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

relatedResourceId.Description: The resource ID of the related resource

relatedResourceName.Description: The name of the related resource

relatedResourceType.Description: The resource type of the related resource

relatedResourceKind.Description: The resource kind of the related resource

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

customerManagedKey.Description: Flag that indicates the status of the CMK setting

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

properties.Description: Anomaly Security ML Analytics Settings properties

kind.Description: The kind of security ML Analytics Settings

displayName.Description: The display name for settings created by this SecurityMLAnalyticsSettings.

enabled.Description: Determines whether this settings is enabled or disabled.

lastModifiedUtc.Description: The last time that this SecurityMLAnalyticsSettings has been modified.

requiredDataConnectors.Description: The required data sources for this SecurityMLAnalyticsSettings

anomalyVersion.Description: The anomaly version of the AnomalySecurityMLAnalyticsSettings.

customizableObservations.Description: The customizable observations of the AnomalySecurityMLAnalyticsSettings.

frequency.Description: The frequency that this SecurityMLAnalyticsSettings will be run.

isDefaultSettings.Description: Determines whether this anomaly security ml analytics settings is a default settings

anomalySettingsVersion.Description: The anomaly settings version of the Anomaly security ml analytics settings that dictates whether job version gets updated or not.

connectorId.Description: The connector id that provides the following data types

dataTypes.Description: The data types used by the security ml analytics settings

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

source.Description: Source of a threat intelligence entity

displayName.Description: Display name of a threat intelligence entity

description.Description: Description of a threat intelligence entity

indicatorTypes.Description: Indicator types of threat intelligence entities

pattern.Description: Pattern of a threat intelligence entity

patternType.Description: Pattern type of a threat intelligence entity

patternVersion.Description: Pattern version of a threat intelligence entity

externalId.Description: External ID of threat intelligence entity

createdByRef.Description: Created by reference of threat intelligence entity

externalLastUpdatedTimeUtc.Description: External last updated time in UTC

objectMarkingRefs.Description: Threat intelligence entity object marking references

additionalData.Description: A bag of custom fields that should be part of the entity and will be presented to the user.

friendlyName.Description: The graph item display name which is a short humanly readable description of the graph item instance. This property is optional and might be system generated.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

watchlistId.Description: The id (a Guid) of the watchlist

displayName.Description: The display name of the watchlist

created.Description: The time the watchlist was created

updated.Description: The last time the watchlist was updated

createdBy.Description: Describes a user that created the watchlist

updatedBy.Description: Describes a user that updated the watchlist

isDeleted.Description: A flag that indicates if the watchlist is deleted or not

labels.Description: List of labels relevant to this watchlist

defaultDuration.Description: The default duration of a watchlist (in ISO 8601 duration format)

tenantId.Description: The tenantId where the watchlist belongs to

numberOfLinesToSkip.Description: The number of lines in a csv content to skip before the header

rawContent.Description:
The raw content that represents to watchlist items to create. Example : This line will be skipped
header1,header2
value1,value2

itemsSearchKey.Description: The search key is used to optimize query performance when using watchlists for joins with other data. For example, enable a column with IP addresses to be the designated SearchKey field, then use this field as the key field when joining to other event data by IP address.

contentType.Description: The content type of the raw content. For now, only text/csv is valid

uploadStatus.Description: The status of the Watchlist upload : New, InProgress or Complete. **Note** : When a Watchlist upload status is InProgress, the Watchlist cannot be deleted

watchlistItemType.Description: The type of the watchlist item

updated.Description: The last time the watchlist item was updated

updatedBy.Description: Describes a user that updated the watchlist item

itemsKeyValue.Description: key-value pairs for a watchlist item

entityMapping.Description: key-value pairs for a watchlist item entity mapping
